cards.name: Prognostic Sphinx
cards.text:
Flying
Discard a card: Prognostic Sphinx gains hexproof until end of turn. Tap it.
Whenever Prognostic Sphinx attacks, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Fated Intervention
cards.text: Create two 3/3 green Centaur enchantment creature tokens. If it's your turn, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.flavor: Drink deep, and know the path to the heart of the wilds.
cards.name: Font of Fertility
cards.text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Font of Fertility: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Hydra Broodmaster
cards.text:
{X}{X}{G}: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Hydra Broodmaster becomes monstrous, create X X/X green Hydra creature tokens.

cards.flavor: "Time is fluid as a dance, and truth as fleeting."
cards.name: Prophet of Kruphix
cards.text:
Untap all creatures and lands you control during each other player's untap step.
You may cast creature spells as though they had flash.

cards.name: Temple of Mystery
cards.text:
Temple of Mystery enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Mystery enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.
